definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tear away, fig. dissipate (cf. Ar. malaxa pull out eye, tooth, &c.; esp. Dozy tear off branch to plant it, &c. so Eth. malx: evellere);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: fig. be dispersed in fragments, dissipated, Pf. [[שָׁמַיִם כֶּעָשָׁן נִמְלָָחוּ]] Is 51:6.
